events.message: I ordered a jacket last week, but I want to request a refund because it doesn't fit and I no longer need it.
The customer issue is categorized as a Refund request based on the refund and return keywords mentioned.
Assigning the refund case to the refunds department for further handling and customer support.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to request a refund for your recent jacket order.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund so we can process your request quickly?
My order number is #A12345. I want to return the jacket because it is too small and I would like my money back.
Thank you for the info. We have initiated your refund process. Please send the jacket back using the prepaid return label we will email you shortly.
Thanks for your help. I appreciate the quick response and will send the jacket back as soon as I receive the label.
The refund case is now resolved, and the customer has been provided with return instructions and prepaid label to complete the refund.
Hello again! We wanted to check if you have received the return label and whether you need any further assistance with your refund.
The refund case has been closed after confirmation that the customer received assistance and the issue was successfully resolved.
A customer satisfaction survey invitation was sent to gather feedback on the refund process and overall support experience.
